answer: The Novartis Q4 2024 Condensed Financial Report showed Cosentyx's revenue as USD 6.1 billion, with a +23% growth. However, this report focuses on general "Entresto and Cosentyx" performance and does not specify immunology segment details or year-over-year changes on reported or constant currency basis for full year 2024 or 2023. The Novartis 2024 Annual Report/Society Integrated Report provided total company full-year net sales figures but did not contain specific immunology segment metabolic data for comparison.
